description: Structured information on an anatomical entity.

hasParent._instruction: Add another anatomical entity representing the anatomical parent structure of this anatomical entity.
hasParent.description: Reference to a parent object or legal person.
hasParent.title: Has parent

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this anatomical entity based on anatomical location or characteristics.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: Name

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) pointing to the ontological term matching this anatomical entity.
ontologyIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
ontologyIdentifier.title: Ontology identifier

otherAnatomicalRelation.description: Structured information on the relation between one anatomical entity and another.

criteria._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to determine this relation.
criteria.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
criteria.title: Criteria

criteriaQualityType._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to determine this relation.
criteriaQualityType.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
criteriaQualityType.title: Criteria quality type

inRelationTo._instruction: Add the anatomical entity to which the relation is described.
inRelationTo.title: In relation to

qualitativeOverlap._instruction: Add the qualitative overlap that best describes the relation between the two anatomical entities.
qualitativeOverlap.description: Semantic characterization of how much two things occupy the same space.
qualitativeOverlap.title: Qualitative overlap

anyOf.description: Structured information on a quanitative value.

typeOfUncertainty._instruction: Add the type of uncertainty used for this quantitative value.
typeOfUncertainty.description: Distinct technique used to quanitify the uncertainty of a measurement.
typeOfUncertainty.title: Type of uncertainty

uncertainty._instruction: Enter the measurement uncertainty of this quantitative value.
uncertainty.description: Quanitative value range defining the uncertainty of a measurement.
uncertainty.title: Uncertainty

unit._instruction: Add the unit of measurement of this quantitative value.
unit.description: Determinate quantity adopted as a standard of measurement.
unit.title: Unit

value._instruction: Enter the measurement value of this quantitative value.
value.title: Value

maxValue.title: Max value

minValue._instruction: Add the minimum value measured for this range.
